text: Kathleen O'Malley (born March 31, 1924) is an American retired actress. Her career began as a child. Her father was actor Pat O'Malley. Her screen debut came in 1926 in one of his movies, My old Dutch. She appeared in many television series such as Cover Girl, Lady on a Train, Two Tickets to Broadway, Maverick, Rawhide and General Hospital. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:2019 deaths Category:Child actors Category:People from Worcester, Massachusetts Category:Silent movie actors
title: Kathleen O'Malley
